role_description: Working as a part of Transaction Reporting System team that deals with high-value transactions
Improvised the UI of Middle office Trade Manager, which lead to significant efficiency improvements
Automated tasks for clients to reduce the hassle and toil of manual work.
Developed a multidisciplinary database management and visualization web application.
Reduced monitoring toil by 15% through task automation.
Enhanced the UI and fixed frontend issues of a Post Trade WebApp.
Proposed a new UI/UX design, increasing efficiency by 25% and enabling easy onboarding of new screens.
Worked as a front-end developer for  this NFT marketplace startup
Built the MVP within a very short time frame due to an upcoming funding round.
The Tech I worked on was valued at $400,000
Developed a micro-frontend application on Chase.com using the Octagon framework.
Integrated it seamlessly with an existing Angular application through the Single SPA framework.
Internationalized the application for multiple languages using i18n techniques, improving accessibility.
Designed custom navigation functionality, resulting in a 30% increase in navigation speed between different tech-stack micro-frontends.
